name: B.E. Aerospace Engineering
description: Focuses on design, development, and testing of aircraft and spacecraft systems.

name: B.E. Automobile Engineering
description: Covers vehicle engineering including design, manufacturing, and operation of automobiles.

name: B.E. BioTechnology Engineering
description: Applies biology and technology in medical, agricultural, and environmental fields.

name: B.E. Chemical Engineering
description: Deals with design and operation of chemical processes and industrial plants.

name: B.E. Civil Engineering
description: Focuses on construction, design, and maintenance of the built environment.

name: B.E. Computer Science & Engineering
description: Core computer science program covering software, algorithms, and systems.

name: B.E. Electrical Engineering
description: Focuses on electrical systems, machines, and energy management.

name: Bachelor of Engineering (Hons.) Computer Science & Engineering (Artificial Intelligence) in Collaboration with Microsoft
description: Specialized program in AI and ML in collaboration with Microsoft.

name: B.E. Electronics and Communication Engineering
description: Combines electronics with telecommunication systems and embedded devices.

name: B.E. Information Technology Engineering
description: Focuses on managing and processing information using computing technologies.

name: B.E. Mechanical Engineering
description: Deals with machines, engines, robotics, and thermal systems.

name: B.E. Mechatronics Engineering
description: Integrates mechanical, electronics, computer, and control engineering.

name: B.E. Food Technology Engineering
description: Focuses on food processing, preservation, and safety systems.

name: Bachelor of Engineering (Computer Science and Engineering) (with Specialization in Full Stack Development)
description: Specialized track in computer science focused on full stack development.
